description:
Subnet Cipher (free) is a subnet calculator tool designed specifically for the TouchPad.  Enter an IP address and get back the typical network details such as network address and class, the capacity of the subnet including the first and last host, and the broadcast IP. 

Free features include detecting your WiFi IP address, filtering out the Binary results, and being able to easily copy the results of the cipher line by line.

If you like this free version, please consider upgrading to Subnet Cipher Pro for the following features and enhancements;

- Automatic or manual Wi-Fi IP Address detection with auto-update (results change in real-time as you roam to another Wi-Fi network)
- Result Filters show the results in Binary, Hexadecimal, and/or Dotted Decimal, persistent to all output files or methods
- Slide-out side panel automatically “bookmarks” the 10 most recent Ciphers for push button re-entry
- User friendly design, easy data entry and convenient copy of results data from all fields
- Printing the results is supported using the familiar webOS print control dialog
- Save the results to a file in either Text or JSON format, save data reflects filter settings automatically
- eMail the results using HTML formatted text, or eMail the results as an attachment (text or JSON)

Please let me know if I've missed anything or if you need a specific feature added, and most of all, please enjoy...  

Brought to you by Youngdahl US
versionNote: fixed access to catalog for reviews, updated Easter Egg
